languages.text: Каждая минута, проведенная на борту, грозила обернуться бедой. Корабль жил свои последние дни, а может, даже часы. Со всех сторон доносились звуки далеких обвалов, пол под ногами то и дело подрагивал. Лорд-капитан торопливо двинул{mf|ся|ась} вглубь исследуемого отсека, как вдруг легчайшее дуновение теплого воздуха коснулось {mf|его|ее} шеи, и рядом прозвучал тихий полувздох. Будто кто-то наклонился к самому уху, обдав горячим дыханием, набрал в грудь воздуха, чтобы прошептать темный, манящий секрет... и замолчал.

Every minute spent on board threatened to end in disaster. The ship's days, or even hours, of existence were numbered. From all sides came the sounds of distant crumblings, the floor underfoot trembled every now and then. The Lord Captain hurriedly moved deeper into the compartment when {mf|he|she} suddenly felt the slightest puff of air brush against {mf|his|her} neck, followed by a soft sigh. Almost as if someone had leaned in close, opened their mouth to whisper a dark, tantalising secret... and then fallen silent.
languages.original_text: Каждая минута, проведенная на борту, грозила обернуться бедой. Корабль жил свои последние дни, а может, даже часы. Со всех сторон доносились звуки далеких обвалов, пол под ногами то и дело подрагивал. Лорд-капитан торопливо двинул{mf|ся|ась} вглубь исследуемого отсека, как вдруг легчайшее дуновение теплого воздуха коснулось {mf|его|ее} шеи, и рядом прозвучал тихий полувздох. Будто кто-то наклонился к самому уху, обдав горячим дыханием, набрал в грудь воздуха, чтобы прошептать темный, манящий секрет... и замолчал.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain was readying to begin a sweep of the ship when {mf|he|she} suddenly felt the slightest puff of air brush against {mf|his|her} neck, followed by a soft sigh. Almost as if someone had leaned in close, opened their mouth to whisper a dark, tantalizing secret... and then fallen silent.

The Lord Captain was readying to begin a sweep of the ship when {mf|he|she} suddenly felt the slightest puff of air brush against {mf|his|her} neck, followed by a soft sigh. Almost as if someone had leaned in close, opened their mouth to whisper a dark, tantalizing secret... and then fallen silent.

The Lord Captain was readying to begin a sweep of the ship when {mf|he|she} suddenly felt the slightest puff of air brush against {mf|his|her} neck, followed by a soft sigh. Almost as if someone had leaned in close, opened their mouth to whisper a dark, tantalizing secret... and then fallen silent.

Every minute spent on board threatened to end in disaster. The ship's days, or even hours, of existence were numbered. From all sides came the sounds of distant crumblings, the floor underfoot trembled every now and then. The Lord Captain hurriedly moved deeper into the compartment when {mf|he|she} suddenly felt the slightest puff of air brush against {mf|his|her} neck, followed by a soft sigh. Almost as if someone had leaned in close, opened their mouth to whisper a dark, tantalising secret... and then fallen silent.

languages.text: Cada minuto que pasaba a bordo, el desastre amenazaba. La nave tenía los días contados, posiblemente las horas. Desde todas partes se oía el sonido de secciones desmoronándose y el suelo se estremecía bajo sus pies. {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} se adentró en el compartimento de forma apresurada al sentir una leve bocanada de aire contra su cuello, seguida de un suspiro. Era como si alguien se hubiera acercado, abierto la boca como para susurrar un secreto oscuro y tentador... y guardado silencio.
languages.original_text: Every minute spent on board threatened to end in disaster. The ship's days, or even hours, of existence were numbered. From all sides came the sounds of distant crumblings, the floor underfoot trembled every now and then. The Lord Captain hurriedly moved deeper into the compartment when {mf|he|she} suddenly felt the slightest puff of air brush against {mf|his|her} neck, followed by a soft sigh. Almost as if someone had leaned in close, opened their mouth to whisper a dark, tantalising secret... and then fallen silent.

traits.locale_text: Cada minuto que pasaba a bordo, el desastre amenazaba. La nave tenía los días contados, posiblemente las horas. Desde todas partes se oía el sonido de secciones desmoronándose y el suelo se estremecía bajo sus pies. {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} se adentró en el compartimento de forma apresurada al sentir una leve bocanada de aire contra su cuello, seguida de un suspiro. Era como si alguien se hubiera acercado, abierto la boca como para susurrar un secreto oscuro y tentador... y guardado silencio.

languages.text: 在失事飞船上度过的每一分钟，都可能在突如其来的灾难中结束。没人知道这艘飞船究竟能撑几天，还是几个小时。远处四面八方传来船体崩塌的声音，脚下的地板也不时颤动着，舰长大人急忙朝船舱深处走去。这时，{mf|他|她}突然感觉到一丝微风拂过{mf|他|她}的脖子，随后听到了一声轻叹，仿佛什么人靠了过来，张开嘴，准备低声道出某个阴暗、诱人的秘密……随后，一切再次陷入寂静之中。
languages.original_text: Every minute spent on board threatened to end in disaster. The ship's days, or even hours, of existence were numbered. From all sides came the sounds of distant crumblings, the floor underfoot trembled every now and then. The Lord Captain hurriedly moved deeper into the compartment when {mf|he|she} suddenly felt the slightest puff of air brush against {mf|his|her} neck, followed by a soft sigh. Almost as if someone had leaned in close, opened their mouth to whisper a dark, tantalising secret... and then fallen silent.

traits.locale_text: 在失事飞船上度过的每一分钟，都可能在突如其来的灾难中结束。没人知道这艘飞船究竟能撑几天，还是几个小时。远处四面八方传来船体崩塌的声音，脚下的地板也不时颤动着，舰长大人急忙朝船舱深处走去。这时，{mf|他|她}突然感觉到一丝微风拂过{mf|他|她}的脖子，随后听到了一声轻叹，仿佛什么人靠了过来，张开嘴，准备低声道出某个阴暗、诱人的秘密……随后，一切再次陷入寂静之中。

languages.text: 船内で過ごすあらゆる瞬間が、どんな惨事を引き起こすか分からない。船の存続期間は数日、あるいは数時間にまで迫っていた。四方八方から遠くで崩れる音が聞こえ、足元はときどき揺れている。ロード・キャプテンが急いで部屋の奥へ進むと、突然首元にエアブラシをシュッと吹きかけられた感覚がして、締まりのないため息が出る。まるで誰かが体をくっつけて、口を開いて暗く魅力的な秘密をささやき、そして沈黙してしまったかのようだ。
languages.original_text: Every minute spent on board threatened to end in disaster. The ship's days, or even hours, of existence were numbered. From all sides came the sounds of distant crumblings, the floor underfoot trembled every now and then. The Lord Captain hurriedly moved deeper into the compartment when {mf|he|she} suddenly felt the slightest puff of air brush against {mf|his|her} neck, followed by a soft sigh. Almost as if someone had leaned in close, opened their mouth to whisper a dark, tantalising secret... and then fallen silent.

traits.locale_text: 船内で過ごすあらゆる瞬間が、どんな惨事を引き起こすか分からない。船の存続期間は数日、あるいは数時間にまで迫っていた。四方八方から遠くで崩れる音が聞こえ、足元はときどき揺れている。ロード・キャプテンが急いで部屋の奥へ進むと、突然首元にエアブラシをシュッと吹きかけられた感覚がして、締まりのないため息が出る。まるで誰かが体をくっつけて、口を開いて暗く魅力的な秘密をささやき、そして沈黙してしまったかのようだ。

languages.text: Jede Minute an Bord konnte in einer Katastrophe enden. Die Tage oder sogar Stunden, die das Schiff noch existierte, waren gezählt. Von allen Seiten war entferntes Knirschen zu hören, immer wieder erzitterte der Boden unter den Füßen. Der Lord Captain drang eilig tiefer in den Bereich vor, als {mf|er|sie} plötzlich einen minimalen Lufthauch am Hals verspürte, gefolgt von einem leisen Seufzen. Als hätte sich jemand zu {mf|ihm|ihr} gebeugt, den Mund geöffnet, um ein dunkles, verlockendes Geheimnis preiszugeben ... und dann doch geschwiegen.
languages.original_text: Every minute spent on board threatened to end in disaster. The ship's days, or even hours, of existence were numbered. From all sides came the sounds of distant crumblings, the floor underfoot trembled every now and then. The Lord Captain hurriedly moved deeper into the compartment when {mf|he|she} suddenly felt the slightest puff of air brush against {mf|his|her} neck, followed by a soft sigh. Almost as if someone had leaned in close, opened their mouth to whisper a dark, tantalising secret... and then fallen silent.

traits.locale_text: Jede Minute an Bord konnte in einer Katastrophe enden. Die Tage oder sogar Stunden, die das Schiff noch existierte, waren gezählt. Von allen Seiten war entferntes Knirschen zu hören, immer wieder erzitterte der Boden unter den Füßen. Der Lord Captain drang eilig tiefer in den Bereich vor, als {mf|er|sie} plötzlich einen minimalen Lufthauch am Hals verspürte, gefolgt von einem leisen Seufzen. Als hätte sich jemand zu {mf|ihm|ihr} gebeugt, den Mund geöffnet, um ein dunkles, verlockendes Geheimnis preiszugeben ... und dann doch geschwiegen.

languages.text: La menace d'un désastre imminent pesait sur chaque minute passée à bord. Les jours du vaisseau, voire ses heures, étaient comptés. Les éclaireurs entendaient fréquemment des bruits d'effondrements au loin et sentaient parfois le sol trembler sous leurs pieds. Alors que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} s'enfonçait dans le compartiment d'un pas précipité, {mf|il|elle} sentit soudain un léger souffle sur son cou, suivi d'un soupir presque inaudible. Comme si quelqu'un s'était penché vers {mf|lui|elle} et avait ouvert la bouche pour lui murmurer un sombre secret... avant de se taire au dernier moment.
languages.original_text: Every minute spent on board threatened to end in disaster. The ship's days, or even hours, of existence were numbered. From all sides came the sounds of distant crumblings, the floor underfoot trembled every now and then. The Lord Captain hurriedly moved deeper into the compartment when {mf|he|she} suddenly felt the slightest puff of air brush against {mf|his|her} neck, followed by a soft sigh. Almost as if someone had leaned in close, opened their mouth to whisper a dark, tantalising secret... and then fallen silent.

traits.locale_text: La menace d'un désastre imminent pesait sur chaque minute passée à bord. Les jours du vaisseau, voire ses heures, étaient comptés. Les éclaireurs entendaient fréquemment des bruits d'effondrements au loin et sentaient parfois le sol trembler sous leurs pieds. Alors que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} s'enfonçait dans le compartiment d'un pas précipité, {mf|il|elle} sentit soudain un léger souffle sur son cou, suivi d'un soupir presque inaudible. Comme si quelqu'un s'était penché vers {mf|lui|elle} et avait ouvert la bouche pour lui murmurer un sombre secret... avant de se taire au dernier moment.

languages.text: Gemide geçirilen süre uzadıkça bela da gitgide yaklaşıyordu. Geminin günleri, daha doğrusu saatleri sayılıydı. Her yandan dağılan parçaların tıngırtısı yükseliyor, zemin arada sırada titriyordu. Ensesinde ölümün soğuk nefesini hissedip ardından belli belirsiz bir iç çekme sesi duyan Lord Kaptan, kompartımanda alelacele ilerlemeye başladı. Bu ses ve nefes, karanlık olduğu kadar cezbedici bir sır fısıldamak için ağzını açarak yaklaşan birinin varlığını andırıyordu... Ancak bir anda susmaya karar vermişti.
languages.original_text: Every minute spent on board threatened to end in disaster. The ship's days, or even hours, of existence were numbered. From all sides came the sounds of distant crumblings, the floor underfoot trembled every now and then. The Lord Captain hurriedly moved deeper into the compartment when {mf|he|she} suddenly felt the slightest puff of air brush against {mf|his|her} neck, followed by a soft sigh. Almost as if someone had leaned in close, opened their mouth to whisper a dark, tantalising secret... and then fallen silent.

traits.locale_text: Gemide geçirilen süre uzadıkça bela da gitgide yaklaşıyordu. Geminin günleri, daha doğrusu saatleri sayılıydı. Her yandan dağılan parçaların tıngırtısı yükseliyor, zemin arada sırada titriyordu. Ensesinde ölümün soğuk nefesini hissedip ardından belli belirsiz bir iç çekme sesi duyan Lord Kaptan, kompartımanda ilerlemek için acele etmeye başladı. Bu ses ve nefes, karanlık olduğu kadar cezbedici bir sır fısıldamak için ağzını açarak yaklaşan birinin varlığını andırıyordu… Ancak bir anda susmaya karar vermişti.
